metadata.description: Meet Carb: slacker, student, robot.  He's just trying to make it through life like the rest of us humans, putting up with his 'bot friends and their daily BS, waiting for something to come along to make his life worthwhile.  But lately he's been experiencing something weird, something he shouldn't be able to experience, being a robot.  Lately he's started dreaming...
metadata.name: REPRODUCT
